snippet:
The new agreement will deliver green
power to Coloplast's Danish sites,
ensuring renewable energy for 100% of
Coloplast's electricity consumption in
Denmark from 2023/24 onwards. The
PPA constitutes a ten-year agreement
providing Coloplast with 9 GWh
electricity per year.
